fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Digital economy and society, Transport, Communication
eu_initiatives: Corporate and commercial law, M&A, privacy and data protection, real estate, banking and finance, IP law, consumer regulation, tax policy , VAT, customs, excise, direct taxes, tax dispute resolution and litigation services.
goals__remit: PwC Legal is an independent law firm.  PwC Legal provides businesses and organisations with legal advice in corporate and commercial law, M&A, privacy and data protection, real estate, banking and finance, IP law, consumer regulation, tax policy and tax dispute resolution and litigation services in and out of court (EU, Belgium and Worldwide).
